data.title: Lag source: Units trying to find a way to a transport ship which is not adjacent to coast
data.body: You can easily reproduce it by creating 20 e1 units, move a transport ship away from all coasts, select all 20 units and right click on the transport ship. Now watch the graphs climb (pink one (tick_time) and blue one (tick_activities)).

data.title: modified:   OpenRA.Game/Widgets/ViewportScrollControllerWidget.cs
data.body: Smooth mouse and keyboard scrolling. Works also when moving the mouse to the corners of the screen.

data.title: Use correct sound for teleporting chronotanks
C&C Airstrip delivery is broken

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
The plane misses its first landing, loops around, and succeeds on its second pass.
This is probably a regression from the world coordinate changes.

data.title: Audio Device Selection
data.body:
It would be sweet to have an option to pick the audio device so the game with its massive explosion sounds plays on the headphones while on the loudspeakers (default audio device) some nice classical music can be played.

I already wrote some overview and a few lines of code, but it's almost nothing by now:

http://pastebin.com/kHKULauT

data.title: Playtest hotfix
data.body: Reverts the game-breaking server regression in playtest-20130713 until we can make it robust.

data.title: Support starting units.
data.body: This improves the flexibility of SpawnMPUnits and adds configurable starting units to C&C.

data.title: Added Urban Terrain Expansion
data.body:
Horray for the picturesque old town construction set made by @CombineCR!

![image](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/756669/784465/a66485e0-ea65-11e2-9e31-8d0aa3a0bc86.png)

[Urban Terrain Expansion](http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&t=16117)

data.title: Regression fixes
data.body: This fixes a few regressions introduced by my recent refactoring.

data.title: Infantry range fix
data.body: This fixes #2417 by converting a few more things to world coords and tidies up some formatting along the way.

data.title: map paths in for mod.yaml
data.body: paths to maps should probably be in mod.yaml so you aren't forced to copy the shellmap and other maps to your mod's folder.

data.title: More details for exceptions for modding
data.body:
Exception files need to show file name and number line for the errors - very annoying to debug mods without this feature.

data.title: Trailing whitespace chars in mod.yaml
data.body:
Having trailing whitespace characters in mod.yaml triggers 'illegal character' exceptions.

eg  mods/abcmod/infantry.yaml (whitespace)

While it's not good practice, it is a minor mistake so it is annoying that it isn't tolerated.

data.title: The ProductionQueueInfo.BuildSpeed field rename has broken yaml overrides
data.body:
Introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/commit/6d6664d9309a4098296c0e8a09cb8ae37f3b629b

All the ProductionQueue yaml refers to a dead BuildSpeed field, when the field is now called BuildSpeedModifier.

data.title: Added 7 interesting maps which where uploaded by Dan9550. Some of them a...
data.body:
...re from Westwood Studios and @Dan9550 calls them conversions.

This is my choice of his most interesting looking maps. Please look yourself at his map uploads and try them out: http://content.open-ra.org/?action=user_items&table=maps&id=32

Here are the map links:

http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=758 Apres Peace *
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=756 All that Glitters...
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=795 Docklands
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=793 Diamonds Aren't Forever
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=781 Cold Pass *
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=838 Naval Conquests
http://content.open-ra.org/?p=detail&table=maps&id=833 Malibu Fields *

I think the \* maps look like interesting team maps.

Perhaps we can include some of these into the next playtest?

data.title: fix a timing bug in LegacyCaptureActor
Im Surrender (dead) and can move (my) persons!
data.body:
How to reproduce : 
1. Send Units via Airplain 
2. Do a Surrender
3. Wait for the Units ^^

data.title: restrict packet size to 4K in server
data.body:
- Sending a negative length no longer crashes the server
- Sending very large lengths can't force us to buffer stupid amounts of data

The offending client just gets kicked if they do this.

data.title: Added EditorConfig Support
data.body: http://editorconfig.org sounds like a good idea. We can then point newbies to the Visual Studio plugin download page when they contribute new code and can't find the button in the feature creeping IDE settings. This also helps for cases like #2310 because we don't follow the yaml standard by indenting with tabs. #3499

data.title: Added StyleCop Support
data.body:
with some rules we seem to disagree disabled. This is not really based upon https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/wiki/Coding-Standard but more or less what @pchote does and @chrisf mourns about at the moment. Maybe we can clarify the conventions here.

There is a [StyleCop](https://stylecop.codeplex.com/) AddIn for MonoDevelop that displays warnings when you right-click and ask for it. I tested this against it. Note: there is a problem with inheritance `..\` vs `../` which breaks a solution wide settings file so I had to copy & paste the file into each projects directory. :/

Even though I disarmed it, we have >1000 warnings per project. Once we agreed on standards and those get fixed, we could have our CI check for those automatically in the future so we don't have to manually tell everyone how to format the code with each new contributor pull request. Also helps me write code in accordance if I have some lint tool to warn me when I am doing it wrong.

data.title: Anti aircraft units and buildings don't damage aircrafts right on top of them
data.body: If a heli is right on top of a missle site or anti aircraft gun, it will get shot but won't get any damage from it. Same happenes to choppers hovering over a rocket solider.

data.title: Convert more things to world coordinates
data.body:
Mostly refactoring in preparation for projectiles (#3434).
The only expected functional change is to Leap (see 9adafcb description).

data.title: Snipers should not attack vehicles or buildings by default but only infantry.
data.body: separated from #3528

data.title: managing games on dedicated servers
data.body:
Admins of dedicated servers should be able to set spots and teams. There should also be a vote for the admin role implemented so "dickhead admins" can get replaced by more reasonable people. In addition, kicking by admins shoudn't be allowed but only a remove vote. On top of it, the kick vote should also be possible during running games.

on non-dedicated servers, admin-kick should be still allowed, also ingame kick.

data.title: Sniper Crawling
data.body:
Snipers should have a stance "crawl" which makes them staying cloaked while moving (very slow) to sneak pass enemy forces. Cloak detection (like dogs, jeeps, flame towers and pillboxes) removes his disguise in their range of sight.
